title: How to Temporarily Remove Ads on Coolmath

steps.title: Go to a Coolmath Game.
steps.content: Go to a Coolmath Game. Jelly Truck, a popular Coolmath game, can be found here: www.coolmath-games.com/0-jelly-truck

steps.title: Right click and select "Inspect".
steps.content: Right click and select "Inspect". Some browsers also call this "Inspect Element." This is where you will edit the website and get rid of the ads.

steps.title: Press Ctrl+F and type in ad-wrapper.
steps.content: Press Ctrl + F and type in ad-wrapper . This is the section name that Coolmath sticks ads into. Your could also search for advertisement .

steps.title: Right click and press Delete element.
steps.content: Right click and press Delete element . This will remove the entire section, removing the add altogether. You can also just press the Delete key.

steps.title: Go to the next ad-wrapper and delete it.
steps.content: Go to the next ad-wrapper and delete it. Keep doing this until all the ads are deleted. There should be 4-6 ads.

steps.title: Go back and enjoy your ad-free game!
steps.content: Go back and enjoy your ad-free game!
